alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:09AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rock Island, northwestern Whiteside, Jo Daviess, western Carroll, Jackson, eastern Cedar, northern Scott, southeastern Dubuque and Clinton Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 308 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Zwingle to Wheatland. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Clinton, Maquoketa, Galena, DeWitt, Camanche, Savanna, Bellevue, East Dubuque, Preston, Hanover, Wheatland, Elizabeth, Grand Mound, Woodbine, Sabula, Delmar, Lost Nation, Miles and Calamus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Whiteside
